DOC.brief_summary: Patients with tumors in liver or pancreas are randomized to ultrasound (UL)-guided FNAC biopsies with guidance method or UL-guided FNAC biopsies with free-hand method.
DOC.brief_title: Ultra Sound Guided Fine Needle Aspiration Cytology (FNAC) of Liver and Pancreas Tumours
DOC.criteria: adult over 18 years tumors in liver and/or pancreas low coagulation factors mentally ill patients.
